players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
Bob was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Charlie: "Bob was killed last night, so we need to be careful about who we trust. I think we should watch Diana closely—she’s been quiet so far."
You: "Let's not jump to conclusions yet. Charlie, why do you suspect Diana so quickly?"
Diana: "Charlie is the mafioso. I investigated him last night and got clear proof. We should focus on lynching him today to keep the town safe."
You: "Diana, your claim as detective is bold. If true, we should vote for Charlie today."
Charlie: "Interesting, Diana. If you really investigated me and found me guilty, why didn't you share any info about Bob or anyone else? Seems like you're rushing to accuse."
Diana: "Diana here, I didn't share info about Bob because I had no reason to suspect him—he was already dead. My focus is on stopping Charlie now. Alice, we need your vote to protect the town."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Alice, Diana voted for Charlie
Charlie was arrested
